@ ALL - Please login and click the [+] symbol beside QUALITY at top of page for ALL torrents from 20-40.

New Rule
What Jon said.
If you really don't like a show,don't spoil it for the rest of us.Just pass it by and download what you do enjoy.
Thanks for telling about the + thing,I never knew what that was for and how to use it. I really like the smaller files and appreciate that people seed them back  :)
